cards.flavor: "The world was not created by machines. We, the Children of Rust, seek to rid the world of machines, and return our mother, Entrath, to her former purity."

cards.name: Compost
cards.text: Destroy up to two target artifacts and/or constants.
cards.flavor: A good compost pile requires water, proper aeration, patience ... and heaping piles of busted robot scrap.

cards.name: Constantina
cards.text:
Steadfast

Troops you control can't be exhausted by opposing cards and effects.
cards.flavor: "Pull the mask away, and there is just another underneath. The lights may dim, but that does not mean the performance is over."

cards.name: Cottontail Recruiter
cards.text: If one of your cards or effects would create one or more cards named Battle Hopper, create that many Shin'hare Militia instead.
cards.flavor: "By the decree of Exalted Emperor Ito, I hereby promote you to the rank of Militia. Now step to the side. By the decree of Exalted Emperor Ito, I hereby promote you ..."

cards.name: Cottontail Scout
cards.text:
[BASIC] [WILD]: [(2)] [ARROWR] Tunneling 1.

When this enters play, you may tunnel a card with Tunneling in your hand for free.

cards.name: Crackling Sprout
cards.text:
Target troop gets +2[ATK]/+2[DEF] and Crush this turn.

Gain a charge.
cards.flavor: "For an eon, Oberon and I ruled an Entrath unencumbered by mortals. It shall be thus again." -Titania, the Primal of Wild Magic

cards.name: Feral Domination
cards.text: When a troop with [ATK] or [DEF] 5 or more enters play under your control, you may have it battle target opposing troop.

cards.name: Filk Ape
cards.text: At the end of your turn, revert all troops.

cards.name: Genesis Pool Naiad
cards.text: You can play an additional resource on each of your turns.
cards.flavor: The fae folk use their command of Wild Magic to shield the mysteries of their society from outsiders.

cards.name: Gobbleglade Witch
cards.text: Sacrifice this [ARROWR] Destroy target constant.
cards.flavor: "Ah, welcome. You arrived just in time to give me a hand with dinner."

cards.name: Hawkwind
cards.text:
Skyguard

When this enters play, draw a card for each troop with Flight in play.

cards.name: Jovial Pippit
cards.text: At the start of your turn, you may choose a card in your hand. That card transforms into a random card of the same shards.
cards.flavor: "Enjoy riddles, do you? Very well, here is one: how is a pig with no tail like a snake with two heads?"

cards.name: Keeper of the Wounded Petal
cards.text: When a Shin'hare enters your hand, this gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].
cards.flavor: "To fail to injure an opponent is to injure yourself. To unleash aggression without inflicting pain is reckless, the floundering of a fool."

cards.name: Lumbering Sparklespore
cards.text:
SOCKETABLE MINOR

SOCKETABLE MINOR

Crush
cards.flavor: It is possible that a Fungal Behemoth capable of obliterating the shin'hare empire could, someday, lumber up from the pits of Sporadia.

cards.name: Manti Ranger
cards.text: Spellshield, Crush
cards.flavor: "Their native tongue appears to be comprised entirely of insect-like chittering. It is doubtful a non-manti could ever hope to understand it." -from the journal of Lord Bernard P. Dunthorpe

cards.name: Mentor of Oakhenge
cards.text: When this dies, transform it into an Oakhenge Ceremony and put it into your hand.
cards.flavor: "Oakhenge doth not belong to mortals. Dost thou believe the monoliths, or their ancient magic, can be possessed? Thou art a fool."

cards.name: Oberon's Eulogy
cards.text: When a troop enters play under your control, it gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF] for each troop in your crypt.
cards.flavor: "Must this miserable onslaught, this rank procession of butchery, see no end? Hath a Primal of any sort known such desperation?" -excerpt from The Fury Of Oberon, Act One

cards.name: Parallel Evolution
cards.text: Each troop you control transforms into a random troop of the same shards and with cost +[(1)].

cards.name: Rune Ear Burrower
cards.text:
[BASIC] [WILD]: [(2)] [ARROWR] Tunneling 3.

When this enters play, it gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF] for each other troop you control.
cards.flavor: The birth of a rune ear is rare, only one will appear in about every ten thousand litters.

cards.name: Savage Lord
cards.text:
At the start of your turn, if the top card of your deck is a Dinosaur, put it into play.

Dinosaur troops you control have Speed.
cards.flavor: The cromags have mastered dinosaur riding, yet soap still remains a mystery to them.

cards.name: Sight of the Sun
cards.text: [ACT] [ARROWR] Replenish your resource points. Gain 1 health for each resource gained this way.
cards.flavor: "No corruption can thrive without shadow. And no shadow can survive the sight of the sun."

cards.name: Spirit Oracle
cards.text: When you gain a charge, target troop gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].

cards.name: Sterling Starwatcher
cards.text: Skyguard
cards.flavor: These same stars that watched over our ancestors shall also keep their gaze fixed on our descendants.

cards.name: Strength of the Redwood
cards.text: Target troop gets +1[ATK]/+3[DEF] and Skyguard this turn.
cards.flavor: "An elf lives a thousand years, a redwood two thousand years. But wrath? Ah, wrath, alas, seems to be immortal." -Balthasar

cards.name: Succulent Cluckodon
cards.text:
When this enters play, gain 4 health.

When this enters play, you may have it battle target opposing troop with cost [(1)].
cards.flavor: The cluckodon is a true delicacy ... if you manage to eat it before it eats you.

cards.name: Surprise Runt Gang
cards.text: Create three Battle Hoppers and put them into play.
cards.flavor: "You just wandered into the wrong clearing, tough guy. Get 'im, boys!"

cards.name: Thorntongue Snapdragon
cards.text: [WILD][WILD][WILD][WILD]: Skyguard, Lethal.

cards.name: Trick of the Light
cards.text:
Revert target troop you control.

Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "To thine own self be true." -Polonius

cards.name: Underfoot Commander
cards.text:
[BASIC] [WILD]: [(2)] [ARROWR] Tunneling 3.

When another of your troops goes underground, if this is underground, that troop gets +1[ATK]/+1[DEF].
cards.flavor: "After we come up out of that hole, we're never going back down again. Be quick, be merciless. Make our deaths meaningful."

cards.name: Warrior of Andronicus
cards.text: [ONE-SHOT]: [(1)] [ARROWR] This gets +2[ATK]/+2[DEF] this turn.
cards.flavor: "I tell my sorrows to the stones, who, though they cannot answer my distress, yet in some sort they are better than the Primals..."

cards.name: Wrathwood Master Moss
cards.text: When this dies, transform it into a Wrathwood Mossling and put it into play.

cards.name: Wreckasaurus
cards.text: When this attacks, attacking troops you control get Crush this turn.
cards.flavor: If it wrecks a forest and no one's alive to hear it, does it make a sound?
